title: Leading European city tourism destinations in 2018 , by number of bednights
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of bednights in millions for 15 number of European City Destinations.
The Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
European City Destination London has 6.61 times more Number of bednights in millions than European City Destination Lisbon which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of bednights in millions for 15 number of European City Destinations.
The maximum Number of bednights in millions 71.16 is found at European City Destination London and the minimum is found at Lisbon where European City Destination is 10.76.

The Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of bednights in millions for 15 number of European City Destinations.
The Number of bednights in millions is highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
The second highest Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the European City Destination Paris.
The highest European City Destination London has 60.4 more Number of bednights in millions than the lowest European City Destination Lisbon.
The European City Destination London has the highest Number of bednights in millions, followed by Paris, and Berlin. Down to the European City Destination Lisbon which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Number of bednights in millions in all 15 European City Destinations is roughly 24.47.
The Number of bednights in millions is 367.12 if we add up values of all European City Destinations.
